reviews.review_msg: Already ready to help and as long as you show interest and put in the effort you will get a good grade. The midterm was tough but he marks everything fairly. He cuts the 4 hour lecture down into 3 hours which is great. Its hard to balance lecture and lab time and I think he did a great job of doing so.

Steve is the best prof I have ever had at SFU. The midterm was super hard but even though my word crashed 10 mins before the exam ended he let me hand it in later. He is super understanding and all his assignments and grades are fair. He is also always available for help. Put the time in and you will get a good grade.
